Package depgraph.Configurator

Class Configurator

java.lang.Object
depgraph.Configurator.Configurator
public class Configurator
extends java.lang.Object
Responsible for parsing and handling command-line arguments passed to the program. List of possible flags: - s DOT file to process - d directory of DOT files to process. - h print help menu - v verbosity of logger - L specify output file used by the logger - o specify output file for final graph Run in gradle using (replace ... with desired arguments): gradle run --args="..." Otherwise pass arguments normally.

    • manageCmdLineArguments

      public ConfigType manageCmdLineArguments​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Parses command-line arguments and processes/responds to them.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments passed from main.
      Returns:
      Type of handle for the reader to process (FILE, DIRECTORY, NONE)
